description: The easing of restrictions is based on a system of public health "triggering", the document says.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey framework for 'phased' lockdown exit published
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey framework for 'phased' lockdown exit published - BBC News
maintext: "But we cannot be complacent, and it's quite possible we won't see a straight line forward through the phases and instead we'll need to move back," Dr Brink added.
